profile.name: Logan Roy
profile.headline: Built a single Dundee newspaper into a $95B global media conglomerate across broadcast, news, digital, theme parks, and cruise lines.
profile.executiveSummary: Six decades of relentless empire-building in global media. Founded and scaled Waystar Royco from a single Scottish newspaper acquisition into one of the world's largest media and entertainment conglomerates. Navigated hostile takeovers, congressional inquiries, multi-billion dollar acquisitions, and a contested succession across four children â€” while maintaining operational control and shareholder confidence through every crisis.

evidence.outcome: Grew single newspaper acquisition into $95B+ global media conglomerate over 50 years
evidence.description: Identified and executed a multi-decade vertical integration strategy spanning broadcast, cable news, digital media, theme parks, and cruise operations

evidence.outcome: Successfully defended against hostile takeover attempt by Sandy Furness and Stewy Hosseini
evidence.description: Outmaneuvered a coordinated activist investor campaign by securing proxy votes and leveraging board relationships

evidence.outcome: Acquired Pierce Global Media (PGM) for $10B, adding prestige journalism to portfolio
evidence.description: Personally negotiated deal terms with Nan Pierce over a weekend, overcoming family resistance and competitor bids

evidence.outcome: Negotiated $192B merger with GoJo streaming platform
evidence.description: Structured complex cross-border deal with Lukas Matsson involving equity swap and operational control provisions

evidence.outcome: Completed 30+ acquisitions across six decades building Waystar Royco empire
evidence.description: Led all major transactions personally including hostile acquisitions, friendly mergers, and strategic divestitures

evidence.outcome: Maintained CEO position for 50+ years through multiple succession crises and board challenges
evidence.description: Navigated attempted coups by family members while preserving operational control and shareholder confidence

evidence.outcome: Built and managed C-suite of 15+ direct reports across global operations
evidence.description: Recruited, developed, and when necessary replaced executive talent including Frank Vernon, Gerri Kellman, and Karl Muller

evidence.outcome: Secured favorable terms in GoJo merger despite weakened bargaining position
evidence.description: Used information asymmetry and relationship leverage to extract concessions from Lukas Matsson's team

evidence.outcome: Resolved hostile proxy fight without losing board control
evidence.description: Personally called shareholders and board members, trading favors and making promises to secure votes

evidence.outcome: Maintained board control through 50 years of shareholder meetings and proxy fights
evidence.description: Structured dual-class share system ensuring family voting control even as public float increased

evidence.outcome: Navigated board revolt during cruises scandal while retaining chairman position
evidence.description: Secured enough independent director support by promising governance reforms and executive accountability

evidence.outcome: Managed congressional testimony during cruises division scandal without criminal referral
evidence.description: Prepared extensively with legal team, delivered measured testimony that contained political damage while preserving company operations

evidence.outcome: Contained fallout from leaked internal documents to minimize share price impact
evidence.description: Deployed crisis communications strategy coordinating legal, PR, and investor relations simultaneously

evidence.outcome: Anticipated and blocked competitor moves across 5 market verticals for 30+ years
evidence.description: Built intelligence network across media, finance, and political circles to maintain information advantage

evidence.outcome: Positioned ATN News as dominant cable news network reaching 85M+ households
evidence.description: Identified and exploited underserved conservative media market before competitors, building loyal viewer base

evidence.outcome: Built and operated media portfolio generating $15B+ annual revenue across broadcast, print, digital, and entertainment
evidence.description: Oversaw operations spanning ATN News, newspaper chains, Brightstar theme parks, and Waystar cruise lines

evidence.outcome: Evaluated and stress-tested four children as potential successors over 20-year period
evidence.description: Created competitive dynamics among Kendall, Siobhan, Roman, and Connor to identify leadership capability under pressure

evidence.outcome: Deployed $50B+ in capital across acquisitions, share buybacks, and expansion over 40 years
evidence.description: Maintained disciplined capital allocation framework balancing growth investments against shareholder returns

evidence.outcome: Balanced competing interests of family shareholders, institutional investors, and board members
evidence.description: Navigated complex stakeholder dynamics where family members held board seats, management roles, and significant equity

evidence.outcome: Maintained institutional investor confidence through multiple crises including 15% share price recovery post-scandal
evidence.description: Conducted personal investor roadshows and one-on-one meetings with top 20 institutional holders

evidence.outcome: Structured $192B GoJo merger with complex equity swap and earnout provisions
evidence.description: Personally reviewed financial models and challenged assumptions, catching valuation gaps missed by advisory teams

evidence.outcome: Identified and contained cruises division liability before it threatened core media operations
evidence.description: Isolated reputational and financial risk by establishing independent investigation and cooperating selectively with regulators

evidence.outcome: Controlled media narrative during family succession crisis across 3 news cycles
evidence.description: Leveraged ownership of ATN and relationships with external outlets to manage coverage of internal power struggles

evidence.outcome: Influenced presidential election outcomes through ATN editorial direction and personal political relationships
evidence.description: Maintained direct access to sitting presidents and presidential candidates, trading media coverage for policy influence

evidence.outcome: Navigated DOJ regulatory review of GoJo merger by leveraging political connections
evidence.description: Used relationships with administration officials to shape regulatory environment favorable to deal approval

evidence.outcome: Managed multi-year succession process evaluating 4 internal candidates and external options
evidence.description: Created structured evaluation of Kendall, Siobhan, Roman, and external candidates while maintaining operational continuity

evidence.outcome: Expanded Waystar Royco operations across 12 countries spanning 4 continents
evidence.description: Navigated diverse regulatory environments, cultural contexts, and competitive landscapes in global expansion

evidence.outcome: Built portfolio of 8 distinct media brands under Waystar Royco umbrella
evidence.description: Maintained brand differentiation between ATN News, Waystar Studios, Brightstar Parks, and cruise operations while leveraging parent company scale

evidence.outcome: Shaped ATN editorial direction that captured 35% cable news market share
evidence.description: Defined programming strategy targeting underserved audience segment, building dominant position in cable news

evidence.outcome: Improved operating margins from 18% to 28% across media portfolio over 15 years
evidence.description: Implemented cost discipline and revenue diversification strategy including advertising, subscriptions, and licensing

evidence.outcome: Restructured Waystar Royco from divisional to matrix organization serving $15B+ revenue
evidence.description: Reorganized to create shared services across media properties while maintaining divisional P&L accountability

evidence.outcome: Delivered congressional testimony that preserved company operations and avoided criminal referral
evidence.description: Crafted messaging strategy with legal team that acknowledged issues while protecting executive liability

evidence.outcome: Structured Pierce Global Media acquisition to minimize regulatory scrutiny
evidence.description: Designed deal terms including editorial independence provisions that satisfied DOJ antitrust review

evidence.outcome: Identified and developed new revenue streams generating $3B+ in adjacent markets
evidence.description: Expanded from core media into theme parks, cruise lines, and digital streaming through strategic acquisitions

evidence.outcome: Secured FCC approval for 5 major broadcast acquisitions across 20 years
evidence.description: Navigated media ownership rules and antitrust review through combination of legal strategy and political relationships

evidence.outcome: Managed $2B+ in litigation exposure during cruises scandal
evidence.description: Coordinated with Gerri Kellman and outside counsel to develop legal strategy minimizing corporate liability

evidence.outcome: Managed corporate real estate portfolio including Manhattan headquarters and global offices
evidence.description: Oversaw strategic real estate decisions supporting operations across 12 countries

evidence.outcome: Launched Waystar digital streaming initiative to counter cord-cutting disruption
evidence.description: Recognized market shift and approved $2B investment in streaming infrastructure and content acquisition

evidence.outcome: Repositioned ATN brand to capture largest cable news audience segment
evidence.description: Directed brand strategy that differentiated ATN from competitors through editorial positioning and talent recruitment

evidence.outcome: Optimized content distribution supply chain across broadcast, cable, and digital channels
evidence.description: Managed complex content licensing and distribution agreements spanning domestic and international markets

evidence.outcome: Managed internal and external communications during 3 major corporate crises
evidence.description: Directed messaging strategy coordinating PR, investor relations, and employee communications teams

evidence.outcome: Influenced media regulation policy through direct political engagement
evidence.description: Maintained relationships with key congressional committee chairs and regulatory agency heads

evidence.outcome: Structured international operations to optimize global tax position
evidence.description: Worked with tax advisors to implement transfer pricing and holding company structures across 12 jurisdictions

evidence.outcome: Managed workforce of 120,000+ employees across global media operations
evidence.description: Oversaw strategic headcount planning, union negotiations, and talent pipeline development

evidence.outcome: Negotiated $4B+ in advertising revenue across ATN and Waystar properties annually
evidence.description: Set advertising rate strategy and personally engaged top 10 advertisers during upfronts

evidence.outcome: Designed executive compensation structure aligning C-suite incentives with shareholder value
evidence.description: Structured equity, bonus, and retention packages for senior leadership team of 15+ executives

evidence.outcome: Tracked and countered competitive moves from 8 major media conglomerates over 30 years
evidence.description: Maintained intelligence on Disney, Comcast, News Corp, and tech platform competitors

evidence.outcome: Managed $25B+ debt portfolio across investment grade and high-yield instruments
evidence.description: Worked with banks and bond markets to maintain favorable terms even during credit downgrades

evidence.outcome: Established Waystar Foundation with $500M endowment for media literacy programs
evidence.description: Used philanthropic initiatives strategically to enhance corporate reputation and political relationships

evidence.outcome: Shaped editorial direction of ATN News influencing national political discourse
evidence.description: Made key editorial decisions on election night coverage and breaking news that moved public opinion

evidence.outcome: Managed 6 distinct business units with combined revenue exceeding $15B
evidence.description: Maintained operational oversight of news, entertainment, parks, cruises, digital, and print divisions

evidence.outcome: Resolved 3 major labor disputes without prolonged work stoppages
evidence.description: Negotiated directly with union leadership when necessary, combining hardline cost positions with strategic concessions

evidence.outcome: Personally negotiated 10+ deals valued over $1B each
evidence.description: Known for aggressive opening positions and ability to close complex multi-party transactions under time pressure

evidence.outcome: Contained share price damage to 12% during cruises scandal versus analyst predictions of 30%+
evidence.description: Deployed coordinated crisis response across media, investor relations, legal, and government affairs teams

evidence.outcome: Influenced presidential election outcomes through media empire and personal political relationships
evidence.description: Leveraged ATN editorial direction and personal access to shape political outcomes over multiple election cycles

evidence.outcome: Anticipated industry shift to streaming 5 years before competitors, positioning for GoJo acquisition
evidence.description: Recognized cord-cutting trend early and began strategic repositioning including digital investments and partnership exploration

evidence.outcome: Made $10B+ acquisition decisions under time pressure with incomplete information
evidence.description: Pierce Global Media acquisition negotiated and approved within 72 hours during competitive bid situation

evidence.outcome: Recovered from stroke to resume full CEO duties within 6 months
evidence.description: Maintained strategic control through deputies while recovering, then returned to hands-on management

evidence.outcome: Identified valuation discrepancy in GoJo financial models that saved $8B in deal terms
evidence.description: Personally reviewed detailed financial projections and challenged growth assumptions others accepted

evidence.outcome: Maintained political influence across 8 presidential administrations spanning both parties
evidence.description: Built bipartisan relationship network through media access, campaign support, and personal engagement with leaders

evidence.outcome: Built executive team capable of managing $15B+ enterprise during CEO absence
evidence.description: Developed and empowered key lieutenants including Frank Vernon and Gerri Kellman to operate independently

evidence.outcome: Mediated boardroom disputes between family and independent directors across 20+ years
evidence.description: Balanced competing interests of family shareholders and institutional investors during contentious governance decisions

evidence.outcome: Approved analytics-driven audience targeting strategy for ATN digital properties
evidence.description: Reviewed and authorized investment in viewer analytics platform based on team recommendations

evidence.outcome: Approved $2B digital transformation initiative including streaming and OTT investments
evidence.description: Evaluated and greenlit innovation proposals while maintaining core business profitability

workHistory.title: CEO & Chairman
workHistory.description: Founded and built global media and entertainment conglomerate from a single Dundee newspaper acquisition. Grew to $95B+ valuation with operations across broadcast news, entertainment, theme parks, cruise lines, and digital media in 12 countries.

workHistory.title: Publisher
workHistory.description: Acquired failing Scottish newspaper and turned it profitable within 18 months, using profits to fund expansion into broader media.

education.degree: Self-educated / Did not complete formal degree

purpose: I build empires. I see what others don't see. I take what I need. And I win.
